## Request for Proposal: Regulatory Valves, Temperature

### Notice Title:

*	NASN (English): REGULATING VALVE, TEMPERATURE
* NNO (French): VANNE RÉGULATRICE, TEMPÉRATURE

### Solicitation Number:

* Solicitation Number (English): W8482-241768/A
* Número de Sollicitation (French): W8482-241768/A

### Contracting Entity:

*	Contracting Entity Name (English): National Defence
*	Nom de l'entité contractante (French): Défense nationale
*	Contact Information:
	+ Name: Johan Vizcaya Collado
	+ Email: johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 576-4914

### Solicitation Type:

* Solicitation Type (English): Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Type de sollicitation (French): Demande de propositions
*	Category:
	+ Category (English): Goods and Services (GD)
	+ Catégorie (French): Biens et services (BS)

### Description:

The Department of National Defence seeks to acquire the following regulated valves for temperature control:

*	Items:
	+ S/N 01-6548376, PARTS KIT, REGULATING VALVE, TEMPERATURE
		-	Part No.: CMBKIT-08587-A6, NCAGE: 94607 AMOT CONTROLS CORPORATION
		-	Quantity: 10
		- Unit of Issue: Each
		- Delivery Location: CFB Halifax
*	Items:
	+ S/N 01-6548376, PARTS KIT, REGULATING VALVE, TEMPERATURE
		-	Part No.: CMBKIT-08587-A6, NCAGE: 94607 AMOT CONTROLS CORPORATION
		-	Quantity: 10
		- Unit of Issue: Each
		- Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt

**Submission Requirements:**

*	Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
*	All documents must be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*	The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*	Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model/part number and NCAGE.

**Trade Agreements:**

*	Trade Agreements (English): Canadian Free Trade Agreement
